name: Aaditya Chaudhary
descs: Hello, World! I'm Aaditya Chaudhary, a first year Mechatronics Engineering student at the University of Waterloo.

I'm fascinated by the rapidly evolving field of robotics and automation and have participated in some form of robotics over the past 4 years. For 3 years I was on FIRST Robotics team 1360, where I lead the software subteam. This year, I'm working on the firmware team of the University of Waterloo Aerial Robotics Group.
